text: Easter eggplant is a plant of the nightshade family, related to aubergine (=S.melongena). The stem and leafstalks are green, or very faintly tinged with purple, and bear a few white spines. Leaves are wavy at the edges. Flowers are lilac, it is recognized by its oblong fruit, also grown as an ornamental plant, for covering walls or trellises. == Other websites == *http://encyclopedia.jrank.org/ARN_AUD/AUBERGINE_diminutive_of_Fr_aube.html *http://edis.ifas.ufl.edu/MV061 *Solanaceae in stamps Category:Vegetables Category:Fruits Category:Solanum
title: Easter eggplant
